apps.name: AltStore Beta Installer
apps.versionDescription: This version of the AltStore beta is patched to redirect to BurritoSOFTWARE's server.
apps.localizedDescription: This beta release of AltStore allows you to install Delta as well as any app (.ipa) directly from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: AltStore | Welcome to AltStore
news.caption: Please read the FAQ for help with installing apps.

news.title: Burrito | Join Discord
news.caption: Tap here to join the BurritoSOFTWARE Discord server.

news.title: Burrito | Step 1 Complete
news.caption: Step 1 is complete. Now, download the Beta installer from the Browse tab.
